sentences.english: It is said, under the clothing this medicine, can instantly ascend to heaven becomes an immortal.

sentences.english: Since all people possess Dao-nature, they can achieve transcendence.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，在人人皆有道性，都是有可能成仙的。

sentences.english: Through ascetic practices, people can become immortals , so they especially value the cultivation of long life.
sentences.chinese: 人通過修煉身體可以成仙，所以他們特別重視養生。

sentences.english: If she could be translated to Heaven tomorrow, she might be expected to ascend without any rapture.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕明天就能昇天成仙，料想她也不會欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: But I've decided not to be a immortal any more.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我不打算再修煉成仙。

sentences.english: At that moment, I became an immortal.
Practices nei-tan work is taoists achieve immortality is the only way to attain.
sentences.chinese: 修練內丹功是道教徒達到成仙得道的唯一途徑。
